name: Vampires N Demons (not actual title)
description:
Vampires N Demons

Your goal is to get to the end. (its a prototype so I wont go into detail on the story)

Essence is the key mechanic, try to keep on top of it as it is used up when you:

Double Jump (w twice)

Shoot (space)

Shockwave (E)

Make Temporary Platforms (Q)

KNOWN BUGS:

Checkpoints don't work properly, sorry.

Wall jumping uses Essence when it should not
